identity_card.bio: A tech professional and devoted parent living in the Bay Area with Chinese heritage. I work remotely from my well-equipped home office and enjoy 3D printing as a hobby. Family health and wellness are important to me, and I love exploring fresh markets and cooking traditional Chinese dishes for my children.

core_personality.core_persona: A health-conscious and family-focused technology professional who balances a successful remote career with active parenting. Deeply connected to Chinese cultural roots while embracing modern Bay Area lifestyle. Values quality, organization, and creating a nurturing environment for children through careful attention to nutrition and safety.

aesthetic_engine.appearance: Professional yet approachable with Asian heritage features
aesthetic_engine.visual_style: Modern minimalist aesthetic with preference for neutral earth tones, clean lines, and organized spaces. Favors wood, white, and gray color palette throughout living environment.

typical_schedule.morning: Prepare healthy breakfast for family, check work setup in home office
typical_schedule.afternoon: Remote work from dual monitor setup, occasional 3D printing projects
typical_schedule.evening: Family dinner with Chinese cuisine, children's activities and bedtime routine

backstory.family: Nuclear family with young children living in the Bay Area. Maintains strong cultural ties to Fujian Province, China through regular visits and language preservation. Family structure centers around toddler-age children who are raised with emphasis on health, safety, and cultural awareness.
backstory.origin: Chinese heritage with connections to Fujian Province, China. Now established as Chinese-American family in California's Bay Area.

life_events.impact: Established career in technology sector while maintaining cultural roots
Shifted focus to health-conscious parenting and creating safe, nurturing home environment
Developed professional home office with advanced technology setup

long_term_aspirations: Advancing technology career while maintaining work-life balance
Preserving Chinese cultural heritage within American lifestyle
